relations.description: Matches values where the requested dimension values is strictly less than the configured one.
relations.title: Less than

relations.description: Matches values where the requested dimension values is less than or equal to the configured one.
relations.title: Less than or equal

relations.description: Matches values where the requested dimension values are equal to the configured ones.
relations.title: Equality

relations.description: Matches values where the requested dimension values is strictly greater than the configured one.
relations.title: Greater than

relations.description: Matches values where the requested dimension values is greater than or equal to the configured one.
relations.title: Greater than or equal

relations.description: Matches values where the requested dimension values shares the longest prefix with the configured one. Prefix matching is useful for data structures that have a natural hierarchy, including but not limited to locales, geohashes and IP subnet masks.
relations.title: Prefix match

relations.description: Matches values where the requested dimension values matches the configured regular expression.
relations.title: Regular expression
